mapper.sql: id,price_name, price_url, price_type, probability, created_time, amount, status, sort

id,
price_url,

mapper.update:
update lucky_turntable
price_url = #{priceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price_name = #{priceName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
price_type = #{priceType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
probability = #{probability,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update lucky_turntable set price_name = #{priceName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, price_url = #{priceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_type = #{priceType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, probability = #{probability,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from lucky_turntable where status = 1 order by sort ASC ;
mapper.update: update lucky_turntable set price_url = #{coverUrl} where price_type = 100
mapper.select: select sum(probability) from lucky_turntable and id != #{exceptId};
mapper.update: update lucky_turntable set status = #{status} where id = #{id}
